text: Update #Powercut we've got the majority of supplies back on in #NP4 #Pontypool but are working hard to restore the remaining properties by approximately 17:00. Apologies for the delay.  Si창n

Update #powercut #Wellington #TA21 & surrounding areas. We're sorry for the delay in restoring power, our engineers are working to have all properties back on by 15:30. Geraint
